channel.title: Nullpointer Every Millisecond
channel.description:
After following this tutorial: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,461131.0.html
There's nothing else added to the client, so there's no other explanation except for that tutorial.
The new bars work fine, it's not a problem with the sprite directories.
